specialRules.Lord of the Nazgûl: The Witch-king has Fight Value 6 & 3 Attacks
specialRules.Leave Him to Me: Evil can't target Eärnur with Shooting, special rules, or Magic
specialRules.A Clash of Kings: Only the Witch-king and Eärnur can inflict the last unsaved Wound on the other
specialRules.Death or Glory: Eärnur is Fearless and the Witch-king doesn't lose Will in Combat
